author: mount2010
comment: Yup, completely agree, all my classmates are falling asleep and the stuff is mostly a repeat of COMT. I wrote to the SL about it and he responded with a chatgpt response -_-. Do write to him though, more feedback might actually get them to do something about it, if not for us then the next batch. I hope they'll actually do our Y2 stuff properly so it might be good to feedback so they can work on that too.
analysis:

```json
  "sentiment": "negative",

  "suggestions": ["More engaging teaching methods", "Improved Year 2 curriculum", "More responsive communication from lecturers/staff"]
}
```

author: Embarrassed-Bit-9300
comment: Who is the SL these days?

author: yvonne1298_
comment: im in one of his classes and his classes always ends 1 hour after the lesson starts.  first he recaps the alert quiz from prev lesson then plays a video. then proceeds to take a 10 min break before doing the chatgpt questions. at this point there is no point in attending the lessons anyway. but hes a chill guy ngl
